meanings.definition: The act of scattering seeds on the ground.
meanings.sent1: The sowings in the garden were carefully done by hand.
meanings.sent2: Farmers prepare the sowings in the spring for a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The birds mistook the sowings for a buffet and had a feast.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like sowings of hope in the hearts of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The sowings of kindness spread joy throughout the community.

meanings.definition: The seeds that are scattered on the ground for planting.
meanings.sent1: The sowings of corn were ready to sprout after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The farmer checked the sowings to ensure they were growing well.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole some of the sowings for its own stash.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, ideas were the sowings of creativity waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The sowings of love planted in their hearts flourished into a beautiful relationship.
